abstract: Apollo Global Management is the latest private equity firm to prove that the third quarter was a boon to the industry, swinging to a profit from the same time last year as the value of its holdings improved.
snippet: Apollo Global Management is the latest private equity firm to prove that the third quarter was a boon to the industry, swinging to a profit from the same time last year as the value of its holdings improved.
lead_paragraph: Apollo Global Management is the latest private equity firm to prove that the third quarter was a boon to the industry, swinging to a profit from the same time last year as the value of its holdings improved.

headline.main: Apollo Turns a Profit as Portfolios Rise

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
